name: Bright Parasite
description:
Lakewood used to be a normal town. A week ago it was overrun by a parasite that turned everyone into zombies. The military was called in to cover up the disaster. Your goal is to leave the town. Before you can leave, you need to collect important supplies throughout the town. You will need to avoid the zombies. You have no weapons, but you do have your trusty candle. The zombies will actively avoid any light source. Just be careful, if the military sees any survivors they will shoot.

Made for Jame Gam #24 Game Jam in 4 Days. Made in Unreal Engine 5 using C++. City Buildings, Roads, Nature Plant Models by https://www.kenney.nl/assets
